content: Ministry of the Government of Singapore The **Ministry of Foreign Affairs** (**MFA**; [Malay](/wiki/Malay_language): *Kementerian Ehwal Luar Negeri*; [Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 新加坡外交部; [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language): வெளியுறவு அமைச்சு) is in charge of [the country's foreign relations](/wiki/Foreign_relations_of_Singapore), as well as handling matters and providing consular assistance related to [overseas Singaporean citizens](/wiki/Overseas_Singaporean). It was established on 9 August 1965. A [ministry](/wiki/Ministry_(government_department)) for the [Government of Singapore](/wiki/Government_of_Singapore), it is also responsible for conducting and managing diplomatic relations between [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) and other countries and regions. ## Organisational structure The ministry now has 50 overseas missions including 7 [high commissions](/wiki/High_commission), 21 [embassies](/wiki/Embassies), 4 [permanent missions](/wiki/Permanent_mission) to the [United Nations](/wiki/United_Nations), and 17 [consulates](/wiki/Consulate). Singapore has appointed 31 [honorary](/wiki/Consul_(representative)#Honorary_consul) [consuls-general](/wiki/Consul_(representative)#Consul_general)/[consuls](/wiki/Consul_(representative)) abroad and has 46 non-resident [ambassadors](/wiki/Ambassador) and [high commissioners](/wiki/High_commissioner) based in Singapore. The ministry is currently divided into 11 directorates which deal with political and economic matters, and 7 directorates which oversee matters relating to protocol, consular issues and the [Singapore Cooperation Programme](/wiki/Singapore_Cooperation_Programme) (SCP) among others. The Corporate Affairs Directorate oversees organisational and resource management while the Human Resource Directorate and Diplomatic Academy manage the development of personnel and training. ## Impact [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) maintains diplomatic relations with 188 countries. In Singapore, there are 70 resident foreign [embassies](/wiki/Embassies) and [high commissions](/wiki/High_commission), 43 foreign [consulates](/wiki/Consulate) and 11 international organisations based in Singapore. In addition, more than 60 non-resident foreign ambassadors are accredited to Singapore. ## Ministers The Ministry is headed by the **Minister for Foreign Affairs**, who is appointed as part of the [Cabinet of Singapore](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore).
